original_text: And she went and did as Elijah said. And she and he and her household ate for many days.
korean_text: 그가 가서 엘리야의 말대로 하였더니 그와 엘리야와 그의 식구가 여러 날 먹었으나

sentences.original_text: And she and he and her household ate for many days.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 그와 그녀의 집안 식구들은 여러 날 동안 먹었습니다
